text: Gianuario (Ariuccio) Carta, (1 January 1931 â€“ 14 February 2017) was an Italian politician of the Christian Democracy political party. Carta served as Deputy and Senator of Italian Parliament from 1968 to 1983 and was minister of the Merchant Navy from 1983 to 1986 in the Craxi I Cabinet. He was born in Bitti, Sardinia. Carta died on 14 February 2017 in Cagliari at the age of 86. == References == Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Sardinia Category:Italian lawyers
title: Gianuario Carta
